show_name: The Day I Became a God (TV)
plot: Yota Narukami is a student focused only on his college entrance exams. During his last summer break of high school, he is approached by a girl named Hina who says she is the god of omniscience. She tells him that in thirty days, the world will end. At first Yota doesn't believe her, but after she demonstrates supernatural predictive abilities, he becomes convinced her power is genuine. Hina, meanwhile, decides for some reason to stay at his house, and they begin a tumultuous vacation facing the end of the world together.
opening_theme: "Kimi to Iu Shinwa" (君という神話) by Jun Maeda x Nagi Yanagi
ending_theme: "Goodbye Seven Seas" by Jun Maeda x Nagi Yanagi
insert_song: "Natsu Nagi" (夏凪ぎ) by Jun Maeda x Nagi Yanagi (ep 9)
"Takaramono ni Natta Hi" (宝物になった日) by Jun Maeda x Nagi Yanagi (ep 5)
